data.text: My son, heed my advice,
Obey my commands,
Tie my commands around your fingers in order that they will remind you to obey them.
Love wisdom like you love your sister.
If you are wise and if you understand what is wise [PRS], you will not sleep with an immoral woman;
One day, I was standing at the window inside my house,
I saw some young men who did not have good sense.
He crossed the street near the house of an immoral woman.
at twilight, when it was getting dark [DOU].
Suddenly the woman came out to see/meet him.
She was a loud talker, one who was rebellious;
She often went into the city streets and plazas/markets,
When she saw that young man, she put her arms around him and kissed him.
“I have some meat that is left over from a sacrifice that I made today to maintain fellowship with Yahweh;
And now I have come out to meet/see you.
I have put on my bed sheets/bedspreads that were made from very fine linen that were imported {people brought} from Egypt.
I have sprinkled sweet-smelling perfumes on my bed—
Come with me; let us enjoy having sex until tomorrow morning.
My husband is not at home;
He is carrying a wallet filled with money,
So she persuaded him by her enticing/tempting words.
And he went with her immediately,
where it will remain/stay until someone shoots an arrow into its liver and kills it.
My son, listen to what I say;
Do not allow anything to arouse/persuade you to go with an immoral woman like that.
She has caused many men to be ruined;
The road to her house is the road to the grave.
